name: WP Random Ads
author: onnayokheng

sections.description:
WP Random Ads Plugin allows you to manage advertising on the post (single post) randomly.

By using the plugin WP Random Ads will help you position the ads on your posts (on a single post).

There are 27 layouts that will randomly change every visitor refreshes the page. And you can also easily layout settings like what you want.

You can display a variety of ad: Google Adsense, affiliate ads, banners, images, flash, text, etc …

Contact me for say hello Onnay Okheng or buy me a cup of chocolate ðŸ™‚
sections.installation:
Upload the WP Random Ads plugin to your blog, Activate it.

1, 2, 3: You’re done!
